metadata.synopsis: Default dialog for RetiredFist_Elf02 in the Retired Fists vignette in the LOW Park situation.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Talk to the Elf Retired Fist in the lower city Park in BGO_Main_A at coords -151, 30, -10

0.speaker: Avourel
0.text: Gods... not seen action like that in an age. Hope I don't have to again.

1.speaker: Avourel
1.text: Aye, well met, citizen! Oh, I mean, fellow citizen, I guess. Sorry - not used to retirement.

2.speaker: Avourel
2.text: Most elves don't oft retire. Guess I'm one of the lucky few.
